response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it could significantly contribute to your business objectives. Considering its intrinsic worth and the opportunities it presents, I am offering this product to you for $9,500. This price reflects a strategic balance between the value we believe it offers and the cost to you, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you require further details or have any questions about the product, please do not hesitate to ask. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate.", "product_price": 9500}
